reviewText: I used this in my biology class and my students received a lot from it.
This show was SO inspiring.  We haven't ever allowed our younger children to watch a PG-13 film but this one was so touching and clean that we let them.  Totally worth your time!
I gave it a 5 star because it IS a great story and presented quite well.  I recommend for everyone.
This is the kind of man I want my sons to be.
Amazing man of healing. He has my vote for prez.
Great watch.

This is a great inspiring movie, that treats different subjects. Ben Carson is a success stories at many levels: academically,  humanly, spiritually. This movie let's you in and let's you witness, feel and learn.
That movie is a great family experience.

Great, inspirational movie for any child that wants to be a surgeon.

I absolutely loved this movie!  I thought the actors did a great job and the story lines were very insightful.  This is not a story that you will hear on the fake news channels.  I highly recommend this movie.
Very inspiring! Excellent movie!
A nice story of a remarkable man
Liked it very much and didn't know some of his early life situations.

Fantastic, inspirational! I cannot wait to watch this with my kids! I'm crying and inspired and I want to be a better person. I want to write whomever made this movie a thank you note for portraying this amazing man as human, flawed, extraordinary and ordinary, a man of deep faith, a man who struggled and worked hard to get to where he got, a man who loved his wife and his mother and his children. YES. I'm watching this movie again. Right now.
Great movie!
Love this show

A true story about a man with a gift that did not come to him as a child but when it did it was more than spectacular.

Must see!!!
Brooklyn
Excellent movie! I miss Cuba Gooding Jr's performances. This movie is a true demonstration about the human spirit's power of determination. Will watch again.

Dr. Ben Carson's story is what deserves 5 stars for sure. I am very touched and impressed by what I saw. The movie in itself is very good too, but it isn't a cinematic masterpiece, which is why I did not give it 5 stars.

It is a pleasant, emotionally intelligent, encouraging and at some times even thrilling movie. I had to grip my face several times and sometimes I found myself praying that it all would turn out right even though it was long since decided ;)

I loved the actors performances, I also love the strong messages of faith, family and dedication that the Carson's believe in and lived out (live out) and the belief, that anyone can do anything if they put their minds and hard work to it.

I don't know how I got to watch it for free too! Haha but I want to thank Amazon for it, I wouldn't have found out about it otherwise :))

A very well done biography of Dr. Ben Carson.  He is a self-made man who is devoted to G_D.  His life is an inspiration to people born into difficult family situations.  It is a testament to how a love for reading can inspire people to achieve!

And for you folks who hate all things conservative, this movie was made long before Dr. Carson launched his political career.
Great life story of Dr. Carson and what hard work can accomplish.
Doesn't work in the US, wrong equipment!
Excellent movie. My 9 year old was truly inspired.

True story!  Without his Mother's strong positive influence and guidance, Dr. Carson's life would be different.
Though some ask how a Pediatric Brain Surgeon is qualified to be HUD Secretary, I see a Smart man - a problem solver, analyzing how to help people.  He's kind and genuinely cares about their current needs, providing a safe, clean and family oriented environment.
Dr. Carson also cares about their future for he knows the path to a life they, themselves worked for also gives them self-esteem and this is the positive influence they pass on to their their children.

Regardless, well worth watching and sharing with children.  It will encourage them to work hard and strive for whatever their dreams might be.  Anything is possible with hard work and God !

Dr Ben Carson and his life story is a great reason to have faith, and hope in our lives. This movie is for All human beings from every background! The character of this man is incredible, and being surrounded by loving, smart, amazing women. Cuba gooding jr and the whole cast did a wonderful job in the portrail of this mans life.
  I personally have a hard time with my faith in Jesus, as many do, but I reflect to others who have struggled before me and stayed the course. Dr. Ben Carson is one of those incredible people who inspires mankind to push further in all positive aspects of life. Take care.

I was watching a political debate and Ben Carson said some crazy stuff like "look at these hands. Several years ago they made a movie about these hands." Well I had to research what he was talking about. This was that movie... and what he did was pretty awesome.

I bought this movie to show to my students and I accompanied it with some articles about Ben Carson. They found all of it to be pretty engaging and it was a nice break from the routine.
It was a great portrayal of Ben Carson's life and how he overcame so many obstacles. My students love watching this over and over again.
Contains so much...hard to put into words so I simply say, Thank-you.

An amazing story of overcoming life's, sometime unfair, challenges. Proof that a higher power exists and wants to help those who are willing to try. The script was well written, but the acting was outstanding, and brought the story to life. Ben Carson is an inspiration to all of us.

Simply remarkable.  Where has this movie been all my adult life.  If you're searching for Purpose, this movie inspires the spark of genius and miracles that lies dormant inside.....waiting.  Thank you Amazon.

It's so good to see this background of this good, giving, as well as wise, man...also to watch and see what God does with him after we've all seen his gentle, godly manner on the campaign trail this season!

This is a very good movie, mostly about the younger days and trials of young Ben Carson.  I did find that the closed captioning was way off kilter.  Half-way through the movie, the closed captioning finally started; however, it started from the beginning of the movie, making it more than useless; it made it confusing.

For the past two years I have shown Gifted Hands during Black History Month.  My elementary students really enjoy the story and because of the demographic in which I teach many can relate (single parent, low income, etc).  One of my students last year told another teacher that he was so encouraged that he wanted to be a doctor!  I showed the the movie over a period of two days and they were disappointed when I stopped the movie:) I suggested the movie to my own children (similar age group) and they both enjoyed the movie as well.  I believe Dr. Carson's story is also one that demonstrates the power of faith.
This is a great story of perseverance and hope. It is also a way to better understand the man and his dreams for a better world.

What a great movie. I knew I was going to vote for Ben Carson but wanted to see this movie to get a idea about this man. No dought he would make the USA a great leader. Wish everyone could watch befor they decide to vote!
Excellent movie. This movie shows that Single mothers who have God on their side can raise children of good character. Very inspiring!

Fabulous movie for the family.  Carson's story is so inspiring and he has made so many contributions to society because of his compassion and gifted surgical skills.  it's tough to accept that so many people would fall victim to Trump's visceral campaign strategy when Carson clearly is a superior man.  Watch the movie and be inspired by a top notch recounting of one man's remarkable life.
My grandchild asked me to watch this movie was great. Thanks

Beautiful, inspiring story for everyone but especially should be shown in every inner city school in America! Also should be shown to every mother in the inner city, she may have been illiterate but she was wiser then most.

Excellent movie. The power of a mothers love and determination to make sure her sons had a better life than she did. Her words and how she pushed them , I'm sure played a powerful part in the success of Ben Carson's fame and success.

Important and inspiring! For me, the acting was a bit stiff at times and distracting, especially from the young actors. However, it is a wonderfully encouraging and worthwhile movie. I've watched it several times now.

Self-serving and contradictory to the political hype he preached on his campaigns and that he shows now that he's part of the current administration.  It only reinforces how unqualified he is to hold any position of public trust. Do not give your $$ to buy into this garbage.

I teach anatomy in an inner city school. My students loved this movie. It seemed to really inspire them. Dr. Carson is an excellent role model for them. The movie shows how he overcame inner struggles and become a successful, honorable man. I hope all of my students are able to look to him and know they can do anything, too.
